_header: Christ that day art and light
_description: A version of ‘Criste qui lux es et dies’ — five quatrains

BLHar1260.First Lines: CRyst that day ert and lyghtthat tornes the merknes of the nyght…
BLHar1260.Last Lines: …rewyl thi serwandes the whylk ere thinethat with thi blode thow bowght fro pyne
BLHar1260.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Middle English Versions of ‘Christe qui lux es’.” 
             Harvard Theological Review
         47 (1954): 55-63: 58-9.
